item.title: Jacque's Pear/Apple Tart
item.description: Line pan with foil/silicon sheet Preheat oven to 400 F and put pan in oven with butter to melt (~1 minute) Take pan out, rub both sides of tortilla into the butter, put sugar on one side and flip it over (sugar side down). Put sliced pear/apple/fruit on tortilla and add little dots of butter around the fruit Sprinkle with sugar Bake 10 minutes Heat up apricot preserves for 30 seconds in microwave Take tortilla out of oven, cut into 4 pieces and brush with a small amount of preserves
